meta_description: Learn calories in 3 slices bacon, including fat, protein, sodium, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.

quick_answer.text: 3 slices of cooked bacon provide ~129 kcal and ~9 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of bacon?
faqs.a: About 43 kcal per medium slice of cooked pork bacon.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in 3 slices bacon?
faqs.a: Approximately 9.9 g total fat, including 3.3 g saturated.
